metadata.title: CVE-2023-41884 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ZoneMinder is a free, open source Closed-circuit television softwareapplication. In WWW/AJAX/watch.php, Line: 51 takes a few parameter in sqlquery without sanitizing it which makes it vulnerable to sql injection.This vulnerability is fixed in 1.36.34.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
